column2: Sundial Growers, Inc. engages in the production and distribution of flower, pre-rolls and vapes. The company is headquartered in Calgary, Alberta and currently employs 381 full-time employees. The firm is marketing its adult-use products under Sundial Cannabis brand and intend to offer products under its Top Leaf and BC Weed Co. brand. The firm sells Sundial Cannabis-branded dried flower cannabis products in a range of formats, such as pre-rolls, oils, capsules and sublingual. The company also seeks to offer edibles, beverages, including dried tea products, vape products, concentrates, extracts and topical.
